title: Woman in Lotus Position
description:
A sitting woman with their eyes closed and their legs crossed in the lotus position. 

Can be used to broadly represent yoga, meditation, relaxation, or calmness.
apple_vendor_description: As seen on Apple devices, the woman in lotus position emoji embodies serenity and mindfulness with a beautifully rendered figure. Her form is sculpted with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, creating a peaceful and grounded presence.  The realistic lighting accentuates the tranquil posture, making this emoji ideal for conveying a sense of calm, meditation, yoga, or a moment of personal peace.
